care_instructions.watering: Water when top inch of soil is dry. Most herbs prefer soil on the drier side.
care_instructions.light: Most herbs need 4-6 hours of direct sunlight daily.
care_instructions.soil: Well-draining soil with moderate fertility. Avoid overly rich soils.
care_instructions.fertilizing: Light application of balanced fertilizer every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

timeline.action: Indoor growing period. Supplement with grow lights if needed.
Begin harvesting outer leaves as plants grow.
Peak growing season. Regular harvesting encourages bushier growth.
Harvest and preserve remaining herbs before winter dormancy.
